title: Red cape (Soul Wars)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A red cape is a cosmetic cape worn by players during a game of Soul Wars. The cape, alongside a red icon, are automatically equipped by players in the red team upon the start of a game, and cannot be unequipped. When a game of Soul Wars ends or the player leaves the tutorial, both the cape and icon are removed from the player.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Red cape
This article is about the in-match Soul Wars cape. For the minigame reward, see soul cape. For the regular red cape, see red cape.
Red cape

Item ID25207

A red cape is a cosmetic cape worn by players during a game of Soul Wars. The cape, alongside a red icon, are automatically equipped by players in the red team upon the start of a game, and cannot be unequipped. When a game of Soul Wars ends or the player leaves the tutorial, both the cape and icon are removed from the player.

Nomad can upgrade the player's Soul Wars capes with ammunition saving effects when Ava's devices (or their max cape variants) are used on him.

The item is now obtainable by players.

9 December 2020
(update)

The item was added to the game.

[[File:Red cape (Soul Wars) detail.png|left|100px]]
A '''red cape''' is a cosmetic cape worn by players during a game of [[Soul Wars]]. The cape, alongside a [[red icon]], are automatically equipped by players in the red team upon the start of a game, and cannot be unequipped. When a game of Soul Wars ends or the player leaves the tutorial, both the cape and icon are removed from the player.

[[Nomad]] can upgrade the player's [[Soul Wars cape]]s with [[ammunition]] saving effects when [[Ava's device]]s (or their [[max cape]] variants) are used on him.
